case_query: products.KEY:ocp AND type:testcase AND caseautomation.KEY:automated AND automation_script:cucushift AND NOT status:inactive AND NOT upstream.KEY:yes AND NOT tags:(stage_only prod_only) AND caseimportance.KEY:(critical high medium) AND env_install_method.KEY:(__all__ upi) AND env_iaas_cloud_provider.KEY:(__all__ baremetal)
